channel.title: If you have windows read now!
channel.description:
Mod please sticky this, i think this is very important.
I'll read the email straight from my office. Microsoft has announced a vulnerability that could allow malicious code to execute within web pages from certain ActiveX controls. Please protect your workstations, laptops, and normal computers.
http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx/kb/972890#FixItForMe
fix this as soon as you can. This can corrupt, CORRUPT your computer.

item.title: If you have windows read now!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I use windows.

I don’t install updates

I don’t run an anti-virus program (unless my brain counts)

I don’t use a firewall

I rarely scan for spyware

…And yet I never have problems? I’ve had maybe 1 virus in the past few years. I removed it just fine.

`Lewk_:

Anyone who has Windows is stupid.

Tell me, what is so stupid about using windows.

Read full topic
item.source: If you have windows read now!

item.description:

iirc windows 7 runs smoother then any other operating system i've ever used. Not to mention, ubuntu wouldn't install for my dumbass ;)

item.title: If you have windows read now!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“ak226688, post:11, topic:288315”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=381152.msg2864647#msg2864647 date=1247377162]
Honestly, anyone who runs windows should know to apply updates and security fixes constantly because that is how often they come out because of gaping holes in windows security.

Anyone who wants a stable, safe system shouldn’t be running windows anyway, give Kubuntu a shot instead.
[/quote]wats kubuntu will it lag my computer?[/quote]

Kubuntu is an Operating system which is Linux. It will definitely run better than Windows. It probably is as fast as XP if you have all the fancy visual effects on, but much faster than Vista.
This is what my Desktop looks like : http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/snapshot1.png

Read full topic
